text: João Fernando Gomes Valério (born 31 July 2002) is a Brazilian singer and songwriter. He became famous with his debut album Eu tenho a senha. One song from the album, "Meu Pedaço de Pecado", was the most played song among Brazil's Spotify users as of 1 July 2021, and also appeared in Spotify's Top 50 Global chart the same month. == References == Category:Living people Category:2002 births Category:Brazilian singer-songwriters Category:People from Pernambuco
title: João Gomes (singer)
